snippet: The crossover-like electric vehicle, expected to enter production in 2013, would be priced similarly to Tesla's second car, the Model S sedan, due in showrooms this summer.
abstract: The crossover-like electric vehicle, expected to enter production in 2013, would be priced similarly to Tesla's second car, the Model S sedan, due in showrooms this summer.

headline.main: Tesla Unveils Model X at Its Southern California Design Studios
